title: We found 30 great gifts that are on sale and will arrive in time for Christmas
summary: The CMF Buds 2A are currently on sale starting at just $19.99, making them a great stocking stuffer. You don’t need to deal with long mall lines or crowded parking lots just to wrap up your holiday shopping, but you probably already knew this. Some of the best deals are online, and even though Christmas is now a day or two away, a lot of Verge-approved gift…
